data.comment: Nottingham kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Goal! Henrik Dalsgaard heads Brentford into a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at City Ground.
The second-half has commenced. Brentford with the kick-off.
Anthony Knockaert is on a sub for Joe Lolley for Nottingham.
In the minute 46, Nottingham make their second substitution with Miguel Angel Guerrero replacing Harry Arter.
Nottingham's Tobias Figueiredo has been booked in Nottingham.
Brice Samba (Nottingham) has received a yellow card from Geoff Eltringham.
In the minute 64, At City Ground, Ivan Toney has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Joshua Da Silva is replacing Mathias Jensen for the away team.
Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a second substitution, with Sergi Canos replacing Tarique Fosu.
In the minute 79, Anthony Knockaert for Nottingham has been booked by Geoff Eltringham and receives a first yellow card.
Brentford's David Raya has been booked in Nottingham.
It's now 0-2 in Nottingham as Joshua Da Silva scores for Brentford.
In the minute 86, The away team have replaced Bryan Mbeumo with Saman Ghoddos. This is the third substitution made today by Thomas Frank.
Goal! Ivan Toney extends Brentford's lead to 0-3.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-3.
The away team replace Ivan Toney with Aaron Pressley.
Maxwell Haygarth is on a sub for Emiliano Marcondes for Brentford.
Joe Worrall strikes to reduce the deficit to 1-3 at City Ground.
